thread.title: Simone Hager Sanders
thread.title_full: DriveTime reviewed by Simone Hager Sanders

author: Simone Hager Sanders
title: Simone Hager Sanders
text: Matthew lima was very friendly and helpful me and my husband walked in and got helped right away we knew what car we wanted we had to pick from two cars drive it around liked it matthew answered all are questions and we were in and out with a new car super happy with it
